Package main.java.se.kth.iv1350.pos.model

Class Sale

java.lang.Object
main.java.se.kth.iv1350.pos.model.Sale
public class Sale extends Object
Represents a single sale transaction, including the items sold, their quantities, the total price, and the total VAT.

    • Sale

      public Sale()

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem(ItemDTO item, int quantity)
      Adds an item and its quantity to the current sale. Updates the total price and VAT accordingly.
      Parameters:
      item - The ItemDTO representing the item to add.
      quantity - The number of units of the item to add.

    • applyDiscount

      public void applyDiscount(float discount)
      Applies a discount to the total price of the sale. The discount is expected to be a multiplier (e.g., 0.9 for 10% off).
      Parameters:
      discount - The discount factor to apply to the total price.

    • getItems

      public Map<ItemDTO,Integer> getItems()
      Returns a map of all items in the sale along with their quantities.
      Returns:
      A Map<ItemDTO, Integer> containing items and their quantities.

    • getTotalVAT

      public float getTotalVAT()
      Returns the total VAT amount for the sale.
      Returns:
      The total VAT as a float.

    • getTotalPrice

      public float getTotalPrice()
      Returns the total price of the sale, including VAT and any applied discounts.
      Returns:
      The total price as a float.
